titleStmt.title: Phillis: honoured vvith pastorall sonnets, elegies, and amorous delights VVhere-vnto is annexed, the tragicall complaynt of Elstred.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by James Roberts] for Iohn Busbie, and are to be sold at his shoppe, at the west-doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Sheets H-L probably by a second printer (STC).
B1 is cancelled in most copies; it contained another version of the text on A4.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe, at the west-doore of Paules
